topic.fullpath: Topic :: Internet :: WWW/HTTP :: Dynamic Content :: Social Networking

name: Tagged_Hi5_Auto_Buy_Pets

screenshots.caption: Multi Login with tagged IDs in Smart Tagged software
Logon with IDs status and pasted pet link

short_description:
The Software provide auto buy pets functionality on social websites tagged.com and hi5.com. i have started from Tagged.com version

for trail version (5 days free), first goto http://smarttagged.com/signup.aspx ,  register for trail version key than copy key to software to activate trail version


1. Download and extracts SmarTTagged_v2_Setup.rar file
2. Run setup.exe file to install
3. when installer complete the process, select link with id from tagged.com and past it in software
4. login with 1,2,3 or/and 4 IDs, when it succeed, click on auto buy
5. After few seconds, software shall start auto purchasing the targeted pet.

Error Fixed:
1. System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException (0x800700AA)

Please use and enjoy! and send comments / feedback and suggestion on sourceforge.net or www.smarttagged.com

thanks
summary: Auto Buy Pets on Tagged.com and Hi5.com social Website
